verbose_text: In order to confirm that miR-218 regulates the expression of BMI1 by directly binding to the putative binding sites in its 3 '-UTR, we constructed a luciferase reporter plasmid containing the full-length wild-type BMI1 3 '-UTR and mutant-type BMI1 3 '-UTR that had 4 point mutations predicted to disrupt miR-218 binding in each of the seed match regions (XREF_FIG).
